Title: China’s first-quarter LNG imports slide as high prices inhibit spot purchases
Description: A sustained elevation in LNG prices has deterred China’s LNG importers from making spot LNG purchases, dragging down LNG imports progressively over the first quarter of this year compared to a year earlier.
Author: CK

Title: Eni, EGAS agree to lift Egypt’s gas output; increased LNG exports target Europe
Description: Italy’s Eni and Egypt’s state-owned EGAS have agreed to maximize gas production and LNG exports from Egypt, with this aimed at increasing exports to Europe, including Italy,  specifically.
Author: CK
